column1: miq- is a Qenya verb meaning "to kiss".
Helge Fauskanger has suggested that the form miqu- (retaining the same meaning) could be valid Neo-Quenya.Helge Fauskanger
column2: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 25 June 2011)
